root.title: Multiple Choice
root.scenario:
A multiple choice page gives you multiple options to choose from with only one option being selectable.

Feedback is available on submission, along with "why feedback" which is specific to an option.
root.question: This is where you prefix the activity with a statement or question.

item.text: This is the correct feedback. Tell the learner why this is correct.
This is the incorrect feedback for any attempt that is not the final attempt. You might give the learner more information and an encouraging message to retry.
This is the final incorrect feedback. Here you might tell the learner which was the correct answer and why.
